categories: Category:Conflicts of the Outer Rim Territories

nodes.text: An unidentified war was waged long before 0 ABY. According to the Keeper the war raged throughout the entire galaxy, from rim to rim. The Keeper's makers were a non-violent race, and as the war reached their star system they chose to flee to parts unknown. They created and left behind the Keeper to restore their planet after the war's conclusion, in the hopes that they might one day return.
